how_to_title: How to convert PDF to ZIP Online for Free
how_to_step_four: Click on the 'Download' button to download the PDF file(s).
how_to_step_one: Click on the 'Choose File' button and select or drag and drop the PDF file(s) into the tool.
how_to_step_three: Click on the 'Create ZIP' button to compress PDF file(s) into a single ZIP file.
how_to_step_two: Add more files or delete files if necessary.
feature_five_text: This tool is designed for all users, advanced knowledge is not required. So, It's easy to convert PDF files to ZIP file.
feature_four_text: Working with PDF to ZIP is absolutely secure. The entire process of joining PDF files happens directly in your browser, no third parties can access your data.
feature_one_text: Thanks to its powerful processing capabilities, this tool is able to group PDF files into a ZIP in a shorter amount of time.
feature_six_text: You can access or use the PDF to ZIP online on the Internet using any browser from any operating system.
feature_three_text: PDF to ZIP tool allows users to compress PDF files into a single, compressed ZIP file for easier storage and sharing.
feature_two_text: You can use this PDF to ZIP tool online for free and with no limits on the number of times you can use it to compress PDF files into ZIP.
page_header_text: Compress PDF files into a single, compressed ZIP file for easier storage and sharing
